p: We were so pleased that you took time from your busy schedule to come to Pershing College. It certainly was a rewarding experience for the faculty, staff, and student body. We have had so many wonderful comments about you and your presentation.
I especially enjoyed visiting wiht you and our luncheon together with our good friends the Munsons.
We are enclosing the article from the Beatrice Daily Sun, along with three photostatic copies.
